alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 9:09AM EST until December 19 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sacandaga River at Hope. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. There are two to three feet of water on nearby roads and properties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:46 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Sacandaga River Hope Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 8 am: 8.6 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 9.5 Mon 7 pm 9.0 Tue 1 am 7.8 Tue 7 am 7.2 Tue 1 pm 6.8 Tue 7 pm 6.6 Wed 1 am 6.3 Wed 7 am 6.0 Wed 1 pm 5.7 Wed 7 pm 5.4 Thu 1 am 5.1 &&
